author: fabiocos
body:
This PR, code proposed by Carlos Erice Cid in:
cericeci/cmssw@2b5c37c
protects the top DQM modules for single leptons against missing input jet correction sequences,
that are causing failures at Tier0, see
https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/tier0-Ops/1846.html
https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/dqmDevel/2406.html

It does not really solve the problem, that requires an update of the sequences to ensure that the producer of the needed collection run, but it protects against job failures.

Additional code cleaning forced by scram code-checks

Back-port of #22992
title: Backport of code protection in #22992
